ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set grouping contains concepts that represent total hip replacement procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Procedure. The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a total hip replacement procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with representing the surgical procedure of a total hip replacement.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Definition: (2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.319:Hip Replacement Surgery SNOMED CT),(2.16.840.1.113883.3.117.1.7.1.321:Hip Replacement Surgery ICD10PCS)
